name: Apple Picker
description:
Apple Picker is a physics based Incremental game where you pick and sell apples.

Made for the Living-in-an-Incremental-Game Game Jam

FreeSounds Used:

Kyster in a little forest: https://freesound.org/people/Kyster/sounds/97178/

Orchard Birds: https://freesound.org/people/HerbertBoland/sounds/...
